Package dag

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlignedWord
    This class represents an aligned word for the post-processing process, consisting of the word itself, the vertex it is aligned to (i.e. the vertex whose realization it is), and the type of alignment.
    Amr
    Class to represent an Abstract Meaning Representation (AMR) graph.
    AmrFrame
    This class can be used to graphically represent an AMR graph.
    AmrParser
    Static class that provides functions for loading AMR graphs or additional information for AMR graphs from a file.
    AnnotationFunction
    This class represents an annotation function for a single Vertex.
    BigraphAlignmentBuilder
    This class can be used to build type alignments (i.e. alignments for e.g. articles, INSERT-CHILD and INSERT-BETWEEN transitions)
    DependencyTree
    Simple wrapper class for a DirectedGraph to represent a dependency tree.
    DependencyTreeFrame
    This class can be used to graphically represent a dependency tree.
    DependencyTreeParser
    This class can be used to parse dependency trees stored in CoNLL format.
    DirectedGraph
    Class to represent a rooted, directed and acyclic graph (DAG).
    Edge
    Represents an edge of a directed acyclic graph.
    EdgeTypePair
    This class represents a pair consisting of an edge and an alignment type.
    Span
    This class represents a span as described in the thesis, which is basically a set of elements.
    Vertex
    Represents a vertex of a directed, acyclic graph.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AlignmentType
    An enum that stores all types of alignments extracted during the training process.
    AmrLineFormat
    Simple enum class used by AmrParser to differentiate between the format used by JAMR and the external alignment format.
